name: Out of Bear
description:
In Out of Bear you have to help the little robot bear to escape his fate from being disassembled for obsolescence.

Fortunately he wakes up in this evil disassembly factory and is where is journey begins.

Avoid traps and solve puzzles, meet new friends that will help you giving new powers and fight big giant bosses.

Collecting all the coins after every chapter you will receive a reward, that will help you in this journey.

PLUS
Out of Bear supports Joypad and Keyboard, just connect your joypad or keyboard and start to play!!!

Like "Out of Bear" on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/outofabear/

Out of bear is brought to you by CyberMachine Studios follow us on Facebook and Twitter:

https://twitter.com/cybermstudios

IMPORTANT:
If you find a bug or you think we can improve something feel free to contact us at info@cybermachinestudios.com 

We want to give you the best game experience ever, help us with your support!
Thank you.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS
W - Jump
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
N - Interact 
Space - Skip Dialogues
